phonos-error-category:
{{tracking category name}}
Name of [[mw:Help:Tracking categories|tracking category]] to list pages that contain Phonos rendering errors.
phonos-error-category-desc: Description on [[Special:TrackingCategories]] for the {{msg-mw|phonos-error-category}} tracking category.
phonos-audio-conversion-error:
Error message displayed if Phonos failed to convert the audio to MP3. Parameters:
* $1 - result message returned by the backend.
phonos-directory-error:
Error message displayed when Phonos failed to create the storage directory. Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the directory.
phonos-engine-error:
Error message displayed when a Phonos engine was unable to generate audio. Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the engine (not localizable)
$2 - error message from the engine.
phonos-storage-error:
Error message displayed when Phonos failed to store audio file in its final destination. Parameters:
$1 - result message which was returned by the backend.
phonos-purge-needed-error: Error message displayed when audio playback failed. This is shown before the {{msg-mw|phonos-purge-needed-error-link}} message.
phonos-purge-needed-error-link: Link shown next to the {{msg-mw|phonos-purge-needed-error}} message. This link will reload the page.
phonos-tracking-category:
{{tracking category name}}
Name of [[mw:Help:Tracking categories|tracking category]] to list pages which use the Phonos parser function.
phonos-tracking-category-desc: Description on [[Special:TrackingCategories]] for the {{msg-mw|phonos-tracking-category}} tracking category.
phonos-file-not-found:
Error message displayed when a manual filename is provided but it doesn't exist on the wiki.

Parameters:
* $1 — HTML link to the file.
phonos-file-not-audio:
Error message displayed when a manual filename is provided but it is not an audio file.

Parameters:
* $1 — HTML link to the file.
phonos-player-aria-description: Aria description for the Phonos player.
